text: Getting Even is a 1986 American Cold War movie directed by Dwight H. Little and starring Edward Albert, Audrey Landers, Joe Don Baker, Caroline Williams. It was distributed by Vestron Video. ==Other websites== * * Category:1986 war movies Category:American war movies Category:Cold War movies Category:Movies directed by Dwight H. Little Category:Movies set in Texas
title: Getting Even (1986 movie)
